name: Best of Arcade Games - Brick Breaker
synopsis: Rediscover all the pleasure of breakout in this timeless classic! Discover lots of increasingly complex obstacles to get by in the 50 levels of Adventure mode: moving bricks, one-ways, indestructible bricks... Extra balls, inverted screen, strafing... unlock ten bonuses and penalties, each more surprising than the last. Only a few bricks left to break? Take direct control of the ball and aim it wherever you want to earn the victory!
